review_text: I stayed for 2 nights with my husband for a relaxing vacation for my birthday in November. This little boathouse is so cute and relaxing. It is nicely decorated has everyting you need and more. Thre is coffee tea, condaments, games, plenty of exra blankets, and space heaters and airconditioners to supplement the the centeral air/heat unit. The master bed is soft and comfy, but if you don't like being wakened by the sun in the morning, bring a sleep mask. I made due by tieing a scarf arond my eyes after being awakened early the fist morning. There is a window near the cealing without a curtin and the curtain on the sliding glass door lets in alot of light. The bunk room is darker with one small window with wood blinds. The bottom bunk is very firm. The living room is very comfortable, there is cable TV, but I don't like TV. I connected my roku but the wifi signal was to week to stream on roku. But I was happy streaming on my phone using my data. Next time I will bring a cable to connect my phone to the TV. I spent most my time on the back porch doing embordiey and watching the ducks, fish jumping, and boats passing by. The space heaters and extra blakents came in handy on the back porch in the chilly November mornings and nighs. We did not leave, as I read there us not much to do in town but a couple of parks. I have chronic fatigue and pain, so I was satisified just staying at the boathouse. The houseboat is somewhat accesiable for people with mobility issues. There are no steps leading to the boat house. I had no problems geting there with my power wheelchair. The is one big step down from the dock to the boathouse entrance about 1 ft. I used my 4ft long ramp and cane to get down the step. I did not feel safe with my heavy power wheelchair on the ramp. Although a lightweight wheelchair or walker would probaly be fine on a ramp. However the doorways are much to small for any wheelchair or walker, you can only use a cane. There are no steps inside the boathouse and a very low threshold for the shower, about 4in. I would recomend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing vacation.
